casebody.data:
BRATTON
v.
STATE of N.C., et al. No. 277P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 7, 2015. Mr. George Andrew Bratton, Riverside, for Bratton, George Andrew. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of August 2015 by Plaintiff-Appellant under Rule 8(a) to Stay All Court Proceedings:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of August 2015."
